languages.text: [draft]Enemies within a circle with a 4-cell radius around the target point suffer 2×X damage and must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −2×X penalty. Enemies that fail the test become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the Psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. At the beginning of the Psyker's next turn, the effect repeats within the same area. In all the formulas, X equals the level of this {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} granted by a psyker's stave.

traits.locale_text: [draft]Enemies within a circle with a 4-cell radius around the target point suffer 2×X damage and must pass a Willpower test with a −2×X penalty. Enemies that fail the test become immobilised until the Psyker's next turn. At the beginning of the Psyker's next turn, the effect repeats within the same area. In all the formulas, X equals the level of this psychic power granted by a psyker's stave.
